TopicTitle: Will bugged struts return to normal when the bug is fixed?

Articles.Content: I think that the wayward nature of struts is already known to Squad but I'm wanting to know whether the flaw lies in the craft file so its permanent and will only be fixed by hyperediting a fixed craft or whether the struts will return to the position they were in the VAB when the bug is fixed. The screenshot below shows an example. The struts are meant to be symmetrically placed but one of them had wound up attached to the ISRU in a way that isn't even possible to do in the VAB.
